name: 裘百明
objective: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
schedule:
Week 1 Course orientation and course requrirments
Week 2 Features of English for science and technology
Week 3 Technical terms, numbers,symbols,abbreviations and punctuation
Week 4-5 Writing principles and styles for technical writing
Week 6-8 Technical letters
Week 9  Mid-term exam
Week 10-14 Technical reports
Week 15-17 acadamic paper
Week 18 final exam
scorePolicy:
class participation 10%
Assignments  30%
Mid-term exam 30%
Final exam 30%
materials:
李開偉，科技英文寫作
Mark Ibbots, Professional English in Use, Engineering. Cambridge University Press.
Eric H. Glendinning and Norman Glendinning, Oxford English for Electrical and Mechanical Engeering, Oxford University Press.
